pages.text: $(bold)Purpose:$() Djinni Possession $(br2)$(thing)Ihagan's Enthrallment$() forces $(thing)Djinn$() to possess a nearby creature. This pentacle does not lead to permanent imprisonment, the spirit and possessed creature will perish within a short period of time.

pages.title: Uses
pages.text: $(li)$(l:rituals/possession/possess_enderman)Possessed Enderman$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/possession/possess_ghast)Possessed Ghast$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_otherworld_bird)Drikwing Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_bat)Bat Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_cthulhu)Cthulhu Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_devil)Devil Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_dragon)Dragon Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_headless_ratman)Headless Ratman Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_chimera)Chimera Familiar$(/l)$() $(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_beholder)Beholder Familiar$(/l)$()
